body:
Hey everyone, OPTOBAT here, and, i dont really know why i am writing this particular topic, but i guess i feel as if i want to get tot know EVERYONE that is active on Avicus a little more :)

I just wanna say, that if you see me during a game or in the hub, be sure to say "hi" and maybe chat for a bit! i'd love to get to know some of you guys, because lets face it - we aren't going to be here forever:S

So if you see me around be sure to say hello and ill be sure to reply! You can just say hi for the sake of it, give feedback on my YT channel or talk about Avicus :D

Anyway, this was random, so imma see you all around :)

- OPTOBAT

title: If You See Me Around :)
